Headline: #15 Jeffery Local Temporary Reroute near 51st/St. Lawerence
ShortDescription: 15 Jeffery Local buses temp. rerouted SB: St. Lawerence, 47th, Cottage Gr. and 51st; NB 51st, Champlain. 47th and King Dr.: near 51st/St. Lawerence.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#15 Jeffery Local buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 51st/St. Lawerence, due to street blockage near 51st/St. Lawerence.

Southbound buses will operate via  51st, St. Lawrence, 47th and Cottage Grove including the normal route streets at the beginning and end.

Northbound buses will operate via 51st, Champlain, 47th and King Drive.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Trains bypassing Garfield
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running, but not stopping at Garfield due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running, but not stopping at Garfield due to police activity.

  • Bus shuttles are available to provide connecting service from 47th to 63rd in both directions.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Headline: #55 Garfield Temporary Reroute near Garfield Red Line
ShortDescription: 55 Garfield buses rtd EB via Garfield, Wells, 57th, Wentworth & 55th; WB via Garfield, Wentworth, 51st, Wells & 55th due to police activity nr Garfield Red Line

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to police activity near Garfield Red Line.

  • Eastbound buses will operate via Garfield, Wells, 57th, Wentworth and Garfield.
  • Westbound buses will operate via Garfield, Wentworth, 51st, Wells and Garfield.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #49 Western Temporary Southbound Reroute near Western/31st
ShortDescription: Southbound 49 Western buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, 31st, California, 35th and Western due to street blockage near Western/31st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Southbound #49 Western buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, 31st, California, 35th and Western due to street blockage near Western/31st.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
